io.pravega.client.byteStream

Interface ByteStreamClient

  • Deprecated. 
    Use ByteStreamClientFactory instead

    @Deprecated
public interface ByteStreamClient
    Provides a way to read and write raw byte streams. This API is NOT intended to interoperate with EventStreamReader or EventStreamWriter on the same segment. It is assumed that any stream passed here to read or write from has already been created by calling StreamManager.createStream(String, String, io.pravega.client.stream.StreamConfiguration) with a configuration specifying a ScalingPolicy.fixed(int) scaling policy of 1 segment. Reader allows direct reading of the bytes from the one and only segment of the specified stream. Writer allows for writing raw bytes (with no headers or wrapping information) to the one and only segment of the stream.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ByteStreamReader createByteStreamReader(java.lang.String streamName)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new ByteStreamReader on the specified stream initialized to offset 0.
      ByteStreamWriter createByteStreamWriter(java.lang.String streamName)
      Deprecated. 
      Creates a new ByteStreamWriter on the specified stream.
